4. **Real-Time Data Processing**: If there are features in the application that require real-time data processing or notifications, Redis can be utilized as a message broker or pub/sub system to handle these events.

5. **Rate Limiting**: Redis can also implement rate limiting for login attempts to prevent brute-force attacks on the authentication system by keeping track of how many attempts each IP address or user has made in a given timeframe.
